About this site

this is me.

If you would like to contact me, please use the form below to send me
an email.  Be sure to include your email so that I can reply.

```{=html}

<form action="https://public.herotofu.com/v1/e61beae0-8c47-11ee-9a51-8b71ed28739b" method="post" accept-charset="UTF-8">


    <input

      type="text"

      placeholder="Your name"

      name="name"

      required

    />

<div>
    <input

      type="email"

      placeholder="Email"

      name="email"

      required

    />
</div>

<div>
    <textarea
	  rows=10 cols=70
      placeholder="Your message here"

      name="message"

      required

    ></textarea>
</div>




    <button

      type="submit"

    >Send a message</button>


</form>

```
